sparkling_gift.name: Sparkling Gesture
sparkling_gift.summary: Find a glittering keepsake for Laura.
sparkling_gift.description: Alicia wants to surprise Laura with a shimmering token. She believes a rare teardrop crystal from the lower tunnels would be perfect.
objectives: Locate a Glittering Teardrop from Wisps.

golden_promise.name: Golden Promise
golden_promise.summary: Secure an ornate ring for Laura.
golden_promise.description: Laura needs an unmarked golden band taken from a rare undead. She is willing to pay well for anyone brave enough to retrieve it.
objectives: Acquire an Untarnished Signet from Skeletons.

silent_shipment.name: The Silent Shipment
silent_shipment.description: The Gate Guard is worried about a shipment that never arrived. He suspects someone in town might know more.
objectives: Ask around town about the shipment.

frozen_hearts.name: Frozen Hearts
frozen_hearts.summary: Collect Frozen Cores from the Ice Floors.
frozen_hearts.description: Alicia needs Frozen Cores to study the sudden temperature drop in the dungeon.
objectives: Collect 3 Frozen Cores from Frost Wisps (Floors 7-9).

cold_shoulder.name: The Cold Shoulder
cold_shoulder.description: Laura is annoyed by the freezing cold affecting her forge. Thin out the Frost Wisps.

lost_scout.name: Lost in the Ice
lost_scout.description: A scout went missing in the Frozen Hells. Find their badge.
objectives: Locate the Scout Badge on Floor 8.

neon_dreams.name: Neon Dreams
neon_dreams.description: The Oracle speaks of a machine future. Bring her Cyber Scrap from the Hive.
objectives: Collect 5 Cyber Scrap from Cyber Imps (Floors 10-12).

ghost_machine.name: Ghost in the Machine
ghost_machine.description: The machines are growing too bold. Silence them.

system_error.name: System Error
system_error.description: The Rebel wants to dismantle the system's enforcer. Destroy the Mecha Golem on Floor 12.

angelic_feather.name: Angelic Feathers
angelic_feather.description: Alicia senses a holy presence. Bring her feathers from the Celestial Spire.

demon_horn.name: The Devil's Due
demon_horn.description: Laura needs strong materials for a masterwork. Demon Horns will suffice.

the_balance.name: The Balance
the_balance.description: Neither order nor chaos should rule. Thin their numbers.

old_world_tech.name: Old World Tech
old_world_tech.description: A piece of the old world lies on Floor 14. Recover it.
objectives: Find the Ancient Drive on Floor 14.

gatekeeper_key.name: The Gatekeeper's Key
gatekeeper_key.description: To reach the Warden, the Crimson Gatekeeper must fall.
objectives: Defeat the Crimson Lord (if not already defeated).

true_warden.name: The True Warden
true_warden.description: The source of the anomaly is at the spire's peak. End it.
objectives: Defeat the Eternal Warden on Floor 16.

new_dawn.name: A New Dawn
new_dawn.description: The spire is clear. Celebrate with your friends.
